welcome_message_body: Welcome to Maidstone, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside, historic architecture, and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Maidstone has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Shamrat Indian Brasserie
restaurants.description: Shamrat Indian Brasserie is a indian restaurant located in Maidstone.
restaurants.address: 36 Lower Stone St, Maidstone, Kent, ME15 6LX

restaurants.name: Pret a Manger
restaurants.description: Pret a Manger is a sandwich spot located in Maidstone.
restaurants.address: Unit 7 Fremlin Walk Shopping Centre (15 Fremlin Walk), Maidstone, Kent, ME14 1QG

restaurants.name: Frédéric Bistro
restaurants.description: Frédéric Bistro is a bistro located in Maidstone.
restaurants.address: Market Buildings, Earl St, Maidstone, Kent, ME14 1HP

restaurants.name: Bill's Restaurant
restaurants.description: Bill's Restaurant is a english restaurant located in Maidstone.

restaurants.name: Wagamama Maidstone
restaurants.description: Wagamama Maidstone is a asian restaurant located in Maidstone.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers luxurious amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport is a modern and compact facility, offering a convenient and efficient travel experience.

terminals.name: Private Jet Centre
terminals.description: The Private Jet Centre at London City Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Ashford International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves a variety of airlines and offers a range of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busiest terminal and provides easy access to transportation options and a variety of shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for 90 minutes. After that, a fee may apply.
